backend/main.mo: Defines actor with user profiles, submissions, check-ins/outs, KPI weights config, access control, and all related types and maps.
backend/migration.mo: Contains type definitions and structures for migrating old actor state to the new format including KPI config and activity records.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten 1–2 sentence summaries for multiple frontend files used across the project.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML bootstrap file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, authentication flow, role-gated pages, theme provider, and root application shell.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Renders an unauthorized-access screen with sign-out functionality and styled UI components.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Form for new users to enter their name and submit a profile using a saveProfile mutation, with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleGate.ts: Wraps content with role-based access control by checking user role and optional director requirement, showing a loader or denial screen.
frontend/src/components/checkins/CheckIn: Displays a thumbnail for a check-in photo that opens a modal viewer with the full image and optional timestamp.
frontend/src/components/kpi/DailyActivit: Card for viewing and editing KPI activity weight configuration with validation, save handling, and loading states.
frontend/src/components/kpi/KPIScoreBadg: Shows a KPI preview with total score, color-coded status, and per-activity breakdown using labels and weights.
Application layout with header, navigation based on user role, and sign‑out handling using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/monitoring/KPITa: Renders a KPI table for submissions with per‑activity scores, totals, loading state, and name resolution from profiles.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, auto-refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, and logout states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as user profiles, roles, submissions, check-ins, and check-outs.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS base styles, color variables, and dark-mode theming for the app.
frontend/src/lib/kpi.ts: Implements KPI activity definitions and utilities to compute KPI previews, points, and labels based on configurable weights.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login screen with Internet Identity sign‑in and introductory feature descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/MonitoringDashboardPa: Displays admin monitoring tools including submissions, profiles, check-ins, KPI stats, and filtering controls.
Page for submitting check-ins with required photo upload, validation, compression, and viewing recent check-in history.
frontend/src/pages/PrincipalCheckOutPage: Page for submitting check-outs with optional notes and displaying recent check-out history.
frontend/src/pages/PrincipalDailyFormPag: Daily activity submission form that tracks five activities, computes KPI previews, and sends structured reports.
frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx: Admin page to view users, update their roles, and delete accounts with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/utils/images.ts: Utility functions for validating, previewing, converting, and compressing image files.
frontend/src/utils/roleLabels.ts: Provides user role display labels and helpers for mapping backend roles to readable text.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Utility functions for converting backend bigint timestamps into formatted or relative dates and times.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), store and retrieve values in sessionStorage, and persist URL params with optional cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, breakpoints, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: JSON project state describing KPI-related features, removal of Teacher Attendance Check, and pending feature requests for configurable daily activities.
